### üìù Changelog

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

# Get git log excluding "nouvelles donn√©es" commits
git_log <- system(
  "git log --pretty=format:'%h|%ad|%s' --date=short",
  intern = TRUE
)

# Parse and filter commits
commits <- data.frame(
  hash = character(),
  date = character(),
  message = character(),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

for (line in git_log) {
  parts <- strsplit(line, "\\|")[[1]]
  if (
    length(parts) == 3 &&
      !grepl("nouvelle|data|donn√©es", parts[3], ignore.case = TRUE)
  ) {
    commits <- rbind(
      commits,
      data.frame(
        hash = parts[1],
        date = parts[2],
        message = parts[3],
        stringsAsFactors = FALSE
      )
    )
  }
}

if (nrow(commits) > 0) {
  cat("\n::: {style='font-size: 0.9em;'}\n")
  for (i in 1:nrow(commits)) {
    cat(sprintf("- **%s**: %s\n", commits$date[i], commits$message[i]))
  }
  cat(":::\n")
} else {
  cat("_Aucune modification r√©cente_\n")
}
```
